T02D1722:89b-1: a'arya t'a re s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1722:89b-3: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1722:89b-4: rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1722:89b-5: 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sgrol ma che //
T02D1722:89b-6: de la phyag 'tshal de sgrub thabs //
T02D1722:89b-7: mdo tsam slob ma la phan phyir //
T02D1722:89b-8: 'dir bri sgrub pos grub gyur cig / dang por
T02D1722:89b-9: re zhig snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la t'am
T02D1722:89b-11: de'i 'od zer gyis bla ma dang sangs rgyas la sogs pa spyan drangs te /
T02D1722:89b-12: bla ma rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs can du bsams nas /
T02D1722:89b-13: yid las byung ba'i mchod pas mchod de /
T02D1722:89b-14: me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D1722:89b-15: mchod pa'i yan lag bdun rgyas par bya'o //
T02D1722:89b-16: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1722:89b-17: sdig pa ma lus so sor bshags //
T02D1722:89b-18: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D1722:89b-19: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
T02D1722:89b-20: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la //
T02D1722:89b-21: byang chub bar du bdag skyabs mchi //
T02D1722:89b-22: rang dang gzhan gyi don sgrub phyir //
T02D1722:90a-2: byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing //
T02D1722:90a-3: sems can thams cad bdag gi sa mgron du gnyer //
T02D1722:90a-4: byang chub spyod pa yid 'ong spyad par bgyi //
T02D1722:90a-5: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog /
T02D1722:90a-6: ces brngod cing de dag gi don dran par bya'o
T02D1722:90a-7: // de nas tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par byas te /
T02D1722:90a-8: byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang
T02D1722:90a-9: snyoms dag go / de'i rjes la chos thams cad
T02D1722:90a-10: stong pa nyid du bsgom ste /
T02D1722:90a-11: aom sv'a bh'a wa shuddha sarba dharm'a sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1722:90a-12: de nas padma dang zla ba rang nyid kyi ngo
T02D1722:90a-13: bor bsam pa'i yi ge t'am las 'od zer 'phros
T02D1722:90a-14: pas snod bcud 'od du zhu nas t'am la thim
T02D1722:90a-15: pa'i bar dang de yang rim gyis zhu zhing thim
T02D1722:90a-16: nas thams cad stong pa nyid du bsgom mo //
T02D1722:90a-17: yang sngon gyi smon lam rjes su dran pas padma
T02D1722:90a-18: dang zla ba'i gdan la t'am sngon por langs la
T02D1722:90a-19: / de yongs su gyur pa las autpala ljang gur blta zhing /
T02D1722:90a-20: de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros tshur 'dus yongs
T02D1722:90a-21: su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das ma'i skur blta'o
T02D1722:90a-22: // de yang sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i gdan la zhabs skyil krung dang /
T02D1722:90a-23: phyag g-yas mchog sbyin par mdzad pa dang /
T02D1722:90a-24: g-yon autpa la'i sdong bu 'dzin pa /
T02D1722:90a-25: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan cing cha byad phun sum
T02D1722:90a-26: tshogs pa me long gi gzugs lta bur bsam par
T02D1722:90a-27: bya'o // de nas rang dang 'dra ba'i ye shes bstims la /
T02D1722:90a-28: thal mo gnyis sbyar ba las gung mo gnyis rgyab tu mdzub mo'i rtser sbyar te /
T02D1722:90a-29: yid kyis snying ga'i padma la t'am ljang gu 'od
T02D1722:90a-30: zer 'bar bas don thams cad mngon par bsgrubs nas
T02D1722:90a-31: / aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
T02D1722:90a-32: zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1722:90a-33: bsnyen pa ni 'bum phrag bcus 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1722:90a-34: rigs pa dang yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad sdud par byed do //
T02D1722:90a-35: sgyu ma lta bu'i blos nam mkha' lta bur bsgom pa ni rim pa bzhin no //
T02D1722:90a-36: de las byung ba'i dge bas yongs su bsngos nas dge b'ai spyod pas gnas par bya'o //
T02D1722:90a-37: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'is grub thabs slob dpon
